flawed_nl_solution:
This month, Christine earned a commission of 3/25 x $24000 = ${<3/25*24000=200000>>200000.
She allocated 3/5 x $200000 = ${<3/5*200000=120000>>120000 on her personal needs.
Therefore, she saved $200000 - $120000 = ${<200000-120000=80000>>80000 this month.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2880, not 200000. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
